file.name: odam-oas3.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'https://pmb-bordeaux.fr'
info:
  description: >-
    ODAM (Open Data for Access and Mining) is an Experiment Data Table
    Management System (EDTMS) that implements a simple way to make research data
    broadly accessible and fully available for reuse, including by a script
    language such as R. The main purpose is to make a dataset accessible online
    with a minimal effort from the data provider, and to allow any scientists or
    bioinformaticians to be able to explore the dataset and then extract a
    subpart or the totality of the data according to their needs.
  version: "1.0.0"
  title: Open Data for Access and Mining
  contact:
    email: djacob65@gmail.com
  license:
    name: 'GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 29 June 2007'
tags:
  - name: developers
    description: Operations available to regular developers
components:
  parameters:
    formatParam:
      in: path
      name: format
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        enum: [json, tsv]
      example: tsv
      description: output format
    datasetParam:
      in: path
      name: dataset
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
      example: frim1
      description: dataset identifier
paths:
  '/getdata/infos/{dataset}':
    get:
      tags:
        - developers
      summary: get information
      operationId: info
      description: >
        Get information on the dataset
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/datasetParam'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: list several status about the dataset implementation
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
  '/getdata/json/{dataset}/check':
    get:
      tags:
        - developers
      summary: test checks
      operationId: check
      description: >
        Made automatically many test checks and return a list several status
        about the dataset implementation
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/datasetParam'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: list several status about the dataset implementation
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
  '/getdata/{format}/{dataset}':
    get:
      tags:
        - developers
      summary: Get the subset list of a dataset
      operationId: tsv
      description: |
        Get the subset list of a dataset along with the metadata
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/formatParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/datasetParam'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: search results matching criteria
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
  '/getdata/{format}/{dataset}/metadata':
    get:
      tags:
        - developers
      summary: Get all attribute metadata
      operationId: tsv1
      description: |
        Get all attribute metadata for all subsets of a dataset
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/formatParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/datasetParam'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: search results matching criteria
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
  '/getdata/{format}/{dataset}/{subset}?limit={limit}':
    get:
      tags:
        - developers
      summary: Get all values of a data subset
      operationId: tsv2
      description: |
        Get all values of a data subset
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/formatParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/datasetParam'
        - in: path
          name: subset
          description: data subset identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: samples
        - in: query
          name: limit
          description: limit the number of lines in the output table (0 means no limit)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
          example: 10
      responses:
        '200':
          description: search results matching criteria
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
  '/getdata/{format}/{dataset}/({subset})?limit={limit}':
    get:
      tags:
        - developers
      summary: Get all values of a merged data subsets
      operationId: tsv3
      description: |
        Get all values of a merged data subsets
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/formatParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/datasetParam'
        - in: path
          name: subset
          description: data subset identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: samples
        - in: query
          name: limit
          description: limit the number of lines in the output table (0 means no limit)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
          example: 10
      responses:
        '200':
          description: search results matching criteria
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
  '/getdata/{format}/{dataset}/({subset})/entry':
    get:
      tags:
        - developers
      summary: Get the entry list  of a merged data subsets
      operationId: tsv4
      description: |
        Get the entry list  of a merged data subsets
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/formatParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/datasetParam'
        - in: path
          name: subset
          description: data subset identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: activome
      responses:
        '200':
          description: search results matching criteria
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
  '/getdata/{format}/{dataset}/({subset})/{entry}/{value}?limit={limit}':
    get:
      tags:
        - developers
      summary: Get all values of a merged data subsets for a specific value of an (WS)entry
      operationId: tsv5
      description: |
        Get all values of a merged data subsets
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/formatParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/datasetParam'
        - in: path
          name: subset
          description: data subset identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: activome,qNMR_metabo
        - in: path
          name: entry
          description: entry identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: sample
        - in: path
          name: value
          description: value as filter criteria for entry attribute
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: "365"
        - in: query
          name: limit
          description: limit the number of lines in the output table (0 means no limit)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
          example: 10
      responses:
        '200':
          description: search results matching criteria
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
  '/getdata/{format}/{dataset}/({subset})/{category}':
    get:
      tags:
        - developers
      summary: Get the variable list within the specified category of a merged data subsets
      operationId: tsv6
      description: |
        Get the variable list within the specified category of a merged data subsets along with the metadata
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/formatParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/datasetParam'
        - in: path
          name: subset
          description: data subset identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          example: activome
        - in: path
          name: category
          description: category
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [identifier, factor, quantitative, qualitative]
          example: factor
      responses:
        '200':
          description: search results matching criteria
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /getdata/{format}/{dataset}/({subset})?limit={limit}: get: operation "tsv3": parse path: path parameter not specified: "limit"
